question: Spot ten differences of the images and answer dot position closest to every difference in the format: [spot index, x, y]. I am going to tip $100 for a better answer.

message.content:
To spot the differences, I will compare the left and right images and provide the dot positions closest to each difference:

1. The cloud in the top left corner is different. The left image has a smaller cloud than the right image.
   [1, 1,1]

2. The cloud in the top right corner is missing in the left image.
   [2, 16,1]

3. The color of the car in the middle of the image is different. The left image has a red car, while the right image has a white car.
   [3, 8,5]

4. The rearview mirror on the car in the foreground is missing in the left image.
   [4, 13,7]

5. The license plate on the car in the foreground is different. The left image has a yellow plate, while the right image has a white plate.
   [5, 15,9]

6. The window of the house in the background, to the left of the palm tree, is open in the left image and closed in the right image.
   [6, 3,3]

7. The palm tree on the right side of the image has more leaves in the left image than in the right image.
   [7, 14,2]

8. The traffic sign on the bottom right corner is different. The left image has a yellow sign, while the right image has a white sign with text.
   [8, 16,9]

9. The shadow under the car in the foreground is different. The left image has a smaller shadow than the right image.
   [9, 12,8]

10. The antenna on the roof of the car in the foreground is missing in the left image.
    [10, 11,6]

ANSWER: [1, 1,1], [2, 16,1], [3, 8,5], [4, 13,7], [5, 15,9], [6, 3,3], [7, 14,2], [8, 16,9], [9, 12,8], [10, 11,6].
